content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To disseminate information about BI tools, reports, and metadata enhancements:

• Send out a company-wide email announcing new BI tools, report capabilities, or metadata improvements. Highlight the key benefits and how they will help end users.

• Hold training sessions or webinars to demonstrate new BI features and answer questions. Record the sessions for those who can't attend live.

• Update internal documentation, wikis, or knowledge bases with details on the new tools, reports, and metadata. Include screenshots and step-by-step instructions. 

• Meet with key stakeholders and power users to review enhancements and get their feedback. Incorporate their input into communications and training.

• Add announcements about BI updates to team meetings, company newsletters, and collaboration channels to raise awareness.

• Measure adoption of new capabilities and gather user feedback to guide future enhancements and communications.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
